title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: August 24, 2022, 05:11:12 PMLast edit: September 11, 2022, 09:46:51 PM by ZipReg
content: Greeting Everyone! I hope you're all doing well! CoolStorage.org Presents..."THE TIMES TRAVELER"16x20 Gallery Wrapped LOADED Canvas#001 CANVAS CRYPTO PUZZLE CONTEST!A hoard of loaded canvases with a design based on a sci-fi concept that altersthe iconic January 3rd, 2009 THE TIMES front page layout. Disguised as aconceptual art project, The Limited Edition pieces of The Times Traveler containan intricate crypto puzzle which has been carefully embedded into their design.Whomever is skilled enough to find the secrets and successfully unlocks the key,claims all of the BTC locked away in the canvases! General Info: THE SETUP!https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5403917.0THE REVEAL!https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5404156.0Official Contest Thread:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5407075.0Detailed Limited Edition Release Information:https://coolstorage.org/TheTimesTravelerCONTEST ENTRY FEE:Price Per Entry: 0.008BTCShipping: *INCLUDED!* Any Import/VAT taxes paid by entrant.*Up to $50.00 / entrant pays any additional shipping espensesPayment: I will PM entry payment detailsJoin a first of it's kind contest, own a one of a kind collectible canvas,and compete for the BTCTC Grand Prize embedded in them! Contest entries are available on a first come first serve basis.Few entry slots remaining! Thank you for your interest!

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: How much Bitcoin will we win?

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on August 24, 2022, 05:29:09 PMHow much Bitcoin will we win?That is a great question buddy  It has been left for the Winner to reveal!What I can say is that the Grand Prize is much more than the entry fee!   There are also bonus rounds with chances for contestants to win other items, some rare! Although, in this contest there are 3 wishes, which contestants can use to help solve the puzzle. Not that it would help solve the puzzle, but contestants could use one wish and vote to reveal the public address of the canvases, which would reveal the Grand Prize total   The upside of doing this, besides learning the Grand Prize total, is that maybe some extra BTCits get added to the Grand Prize by anonymous onlookers?  Hey, it's a first of it's kind concept and contest, so don't think I'm not going to make it special! Currently there is a welcome raffle which is free for all contestants, almost full right here:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5410154.0Few entry spots remain! Thanks again for your interest!

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: not gonna lie, i've been trying to figure mine out and am pretty stumped. Maybe it is easier than I am making it, or maybe it is harder, I have kinda given up as I have no idea what to do with what I have figured out thus far. geo

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: geophphreigh on August 24, 2022, 06:51:45 PMnot gonna lie, i've been trying to figure mine out and am pretty stumped. Maybe it is easier than I am making it, or maybe it is harder, I have kinda given up as I have no idea what to do with what I have figured out thus far. geoHey buddy   this put a smile on my face. I wondered if you'd be working on trying to solve it before the CLUE is revealed and the contest officially starts  We've still got some canvases en-route and a few remaining entry spots available.In the near future I will announce the date we will reveal the CLUE and officially kick the contest off!Thanks again man, happy to have you in the contest!

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: Haha I'm in the same boat as geo, waiting impatiently for some clues lol

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.created_time: August 25, 2022, 12:18:08 AMLast edit: August 25, 2022, 10:13:55 PM by ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on August 24, 2022, 08:07:52 PMHaha I'm in the same boat as geo, waiting impatiently for some clues lolHey buddy   very happy to hear that  thanks once again and happy to have you in the contest! I guarantee there will be some surprises and fun ahead when we kick this thing off. It's all about having fun with a new concept!I'm actually surprised we don't have more OG member entries? Where's the guy who won my BIP38 contest?

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: Quote from: ZipReg on August 24, 2022, 07:11:44 PMQuote from: geophphreigh on August 24, 2022, 06:51:45 PMnot gonna lie, i've been trying to figure mine out and am pretty stumped. Huh. I guess I misunderstood. I was under the impression that it could be solved with one canvas print alone and no clues, other pics, or other canvases. I thought it started when I purchased mine? I will continue to try to solve it, but historically I'm not great at this type of thing, just glad to have the canvas anyway. Geo

comments.body: Quote from: geophphreigh on August 25, 2022, 01:50:28 AMQuote from: ZipReg on August 24, 2022, 07:11:44 PMQuote from: geophphreigh on August 24, 2022, 06:51:45 PMnot gonna lie, i've been trying to figure mine out and am pretty stumped. Huh. I guess I misunderstood. I was under the impression that it could be solved with one canvas print alone and no clues, other pics, or other canvases. I thought it started when I purchased mine? I will continue to try to solve it, but historically I'm not great at this type of thing, just glad to have the canvas anyway. GeoHey Geo   you are correct buddy, you only need (1) Entry / Limited Edition Canvas to win, however, I will reveal one CLUE to help solve the puzzle when we kick the contest off. More info is available in the official contest thread also (link in OP)

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Hey guys! There is now an entry form on the official site, so if you think the entry fee I'm offering here is way too low and want to pay a little more to enter this contest, you can now do that by using this fancy new official online entry form! Just click the ENTER below, then click the ENTER button near the bottom of the official page. Thanks!

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Cool idea.  Always nice to see something new and well thought out.  Good luck to everyone with the contest!  I'll definitely have to check back and see how it plays out once a winner is announced.  Hopefully this goes well and inspires others to do cool things like this as well.

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on August 26, 2022, 09:47:19 PMCool idea.  Always nice to see something new and well thought out.  Good luck to everyone with the contest!  I'll definitely have to check back and see how it plays out once a winner is announced.  Hopefully this goes well and inspires others to do cool things like this as well.  Hey OG  Thank you for the kind words, Sir! I greatly appreciate the compliment!I really am proud of the concept and would love to see other makers enter this new genre of loaded crypto collectibles with their own unique releases. I definitely have plans to try some cool stuff I've thought about making with the concept! The contest is definitely well thought out and planned , what I'm lacking is marketing skills i guess!  I thought for sure a 21 piece limited edition "first of its kind loaded canvas" would be an easy sell out, turns out the "CONTEST" part may be the best deterrent for making that not happen LOL, as I suspect with everything we all have going on IRL some people feel they don't have the time. Maybe I'm wrong? Would appreciate any insight guys! In any case, I am eternally grateful for all the support I've received on this project, I honestly can't thank you all enough everyone! We have a few entry spots still available! Thanks again!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.created_time: August 28, 2022, 06:58:14 PMLast edit: September 02, 2022, 06:55:37 PM by ZipReg
comments.body: Hey guys if you're only in it for one of the 1 of 21 limited edition pieces, the good news is I can't "make" you try to solve the puzzle!  This is last call to get in on the Casascius KEEP CALM and HODL prototype welcome raffle for contestants only.I'll be rolling that bad boy tomorrow, so if you want in on this contest and a chance to win the prototype CAS canvas, let me know!  Thanks!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Hey guys   The contest has officially been underway for ONE WEEK!Entry spots are still available, so if you're not scared to have a little FUN?Join a first of it's kind contest, own a one of a kind LOADED collectible canvas,and compete to solve the BTCTC Grand Prize private key, embedded in plain sight!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: You can still join a first of it's kind contest and own a one of a kind collectible!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Hey guys   We're officially into the SECOND WEEK of the contest!The BTCTC Grand Prize remains up for grabs, and contest entry's are still available!  Thanks!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: THREE WEEKS since the launch of the contest and the BTCTC Grand Prize is still up for grabs!You can still ENTER and WIN!  Snag a first of it's kind contest entry while they are available! Thanks!
